00075     /**
00076      * @breif Default constructor.
00077      * 
00078      * If the user is set a call to Boo_Page::setUser() is made with the supplied $user.
00079      * 
00080      * @param object $user[optional] The user. 
00081      * @return void This function does not set a return value.
00082      * 
00083      */
00084     public function __construct($user = false) {
00085         // start session
00086         session_start();
00087         
00088         if (BOO_BROWSER) {
00089             if (class_exists('Browser', false) && BOO_CLASS) {
00090                 $this->browser = new Browser;
00091             } else {
00092                 $this->browser = new Boo_Browser;
00093             }
00094             
00095         } else {
00096             $this->browser = false;
00097         }
00098         
00099         if ($user) {
00100             // set user if it is passed in the constructor
00101             $this->setUser($user);
00102         } else {
00103             // setup default user
00104             if (class_exists('User', false) && BOO_CLASS) {
00105                 $this->user = new User;
00106             } else {
00107                 $this->user = new Boo_User;
00108             }
00109         }
00110         
00111         if (class_exists('Dialog_MessageBox', false) && BOO_CLASS) {
00112             $this->msgError = new Dialog_MessageBox;
00113             $this->msgWarning = new Dialog_MessageBox;
00114             $this->msgSuccess = new Dialog_MessageBox;
00115             $this->msgGlobal = new Dialog_MessageBox;
00116         } else {
00117             $this->msgError = new Boo_Dialog_MessageBox;
00118             $this->msgWarning = new Boo_Dialog_MessageBox;
00119             $this->msgSuccess = new Boo_Dialog_MessageBox;
00120             $this->msgGlobal = new Boo_Dialog_MessageBox;
00121         }
00122         
00123         $this->msgError->addClass('error');
00124         $this->msgError->setAttr('id', 'messagebox-error');
00125         $this->msgError->icon->setAttr('src', BOO_IMAGE_DIR_HTML . '/icons/messagebox-error.png');
00126         $this->msgError->icon->setAttr('alt', 'Message Box Error');
00127         $this->msgError->openSession();
00128         
00129         $this->msgWarning->addClass('warning');
00130         $this->msgWarning->setAttr('id', 'messagebox-warning');
00131         $this->msgWarning->icon->setAttr('src', BOO_IMAGE_DIR_HTML . '/icons/messagebox-warning.png');
00132         $this->msgWarning->icon->setAttr('alt', 'Message Box Warning');
00133         $this->msgWarning->openSession();
00134         
00135         $this->msgSuccess->addClass('success');
00136         $this->msgSuccess->setAttr('id', 'messagebox-success');
00137         $this->msgSuccess->icon->setAttr('src', BOO_IMAGE_DIR_HTML . '/icons/messagebox-success.png');
00138         $this->msgSuccess->icon->setAttr('alt', 'Message Box Success');
00139         $this->msgSuccess->openSession();
00140         
00141         $this->msgGlobal->addClass('global');
00142         $this->msgGlobal->setAttr('id', 'messagebox-global');
00143         $this->msgGlobal->icon->setAttr('src', BOO_IMAGE_DIR_HTML . '/icons/messagebox-global.png');
00144         $this->msgGlobal->icon->setAttr('alt', 'Message Box Global');
00145         $this->msgGlobal->openSession();
00146         
00147         // set user ID
00148         $userId = ((isset($_SESSION['boo_user_id'])) ? $_SESSION['boo_user_id'] : false);
00149         
00150         if ($userId) {
00151             // open user if possible
00152             $this->user->open($userId);
00153         }
00154     }

00156     /**
00157      * @breif Sets the pages user.
00158      * 
00159      * This function is used to set the page user. The object should be of a type derived from Boo_User.
00160      * It will overide the existing user. This is usefull if you want to extend the Boo_User object while retaning 
00161      * the functionality of the Boo_Page object. This method is called by the constructor.
00162      * 
00163      * @see Boo_User::__construct()
00164      * @param object $user The user. 
00165      * @return bool Function always returns TURE.
00166      * 
00167      */
00168     private function setUser($user) { 
00169         $this->user = $user;
00170         return true;
00171     }

00177     public function getUser() { return $this->user; }
00178     
00179     /**
00180      * @brief Redirects user to given URL.
00181      * 
00182      * @param string $url[optional] The URL to redirect to.
00183      * 
00184      * @return void This function will always exit after redirect.
00185      */
00186     public function redirect($url = '/') {
00187         $url = urldecode($url);
00188         
00189         $parts = parse_url($url);
00190         if (isset($parts['scheme'])) {
00191             // absolute URL, don't mess with it
00192             $location = $url;
00193         } else {
00194             // relative URL
00195             if (substr($parts['path'], 0, 1) == '/') {
00196                 // relative URL starting with a forward slash
00197                 $location = BOO_SCHEME . '://' . BOO_DOMAIN . $parts['path'];
00198             } else {
00199                 // relative URL without a forward slash
00200                 // remove the trailing slash if present
00201                 $dirname = rtrim(dirname($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']), '/');
00202                 
00203                 // fix ../
00204                 while (substr($parts['path'], 0, 3) == '../') {
00205                     $dirname = dirname($dirname);
00206                     $parts['path'] = substr($parts['path'], 3);
00207                 }
00208                 $dirname = rtrim($dirname, '/');
00209                 
00210                 $location = BOO_SCHEME . '://' . BOO_DOMAIN . $dirname . '/' . $parts['path'];
00211             }
00212             
00213             // add query
00214             if (isset($parts['query'])) {
00215                 $location .= '?' . $parts['query'];
00216             }
00217             
00218             // add fragment
00219             if (isset($parts['fragment'])) {
00220                 $location .= '#' . $parts['fragment'];
00221             }
00222             
00223         }
00224         
00225         session_write_close(); // close session
00226         
00227         //echo $location; // useful for debugging
00228         //pre_r($parts); // useful for debugging
00229         
00230         header('Location: ' . $location); // don't encode url
00231         exit(); // exit normaly
00232     }

00234     /**
00235      * @brief Determins if page is a postback.
00236      * @return bool Returns TRUE if page is a postback, FALSE otherwise.
00237      */
00238     public function isPostback() { return !empty($_POST); }

00240     /**
00241      * @brief Determins if the page is secured with SSL.
00242      * @return bool Returns TRUE if page is secured with SSL, FALSE otherwise.
00243      */
00244     public function isSsl() { return isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] == 'on'; }
00245     
00246     /**
00247      * @brief Redirects users to the SSL version of the current page.
00248      * 
00249      * Function is ignored unless \c BOO_PRODUCTION is set to TRUE because SSL is rarely used 
00250      * in development enviroments.
00251      * 
00252      * @return bool Returns TRUE if page is already secured with SSL.
00253      */
00254     public function forceSsl() {
00255         if (BOO_PRODUCTION && BOO_SSL) {
00256             if (!$this->isSsl()) {
00257                 $url = 'https://' . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
00258                 $this->redirect($url);
00259             } else {
00260                 return true;
00261             }
00262         } else {
00263             // only use SSL in production mode when BOO_SSL is enabled
00264             return true;
00265         }
00266     }
00267     
00268     public function setTemplate($template) {
00269         $template = trim($template);
00270         
00271         if (preg_match('/^[A-Za-z0-9-_\/]+$/', $template) && strlen($template) <= 255) { // allows forward slashes
00272             $this->template = $template;
00273         } else {
00274             trigger_error("Template {$template} is not valied", E_USER_ERROR);
00275             return false;
00276         }
00277         
00278     }
00279     
00280     public function getTemplate() { return $this->template; }
00281     
00282     /**
00283      * @brief Checks if page is a given template
00284      * 
00285      * @param string $template The template to check.
00286      * @return bool Returns TRUE if page is that template, FALSE otherwise.
00287      * @todo Improve template support for child templates.
00288      */
00289     public function isTemplate($template) {
00290         $template = trim($template);
00291         return $this->template == $template;
00292     }
00293     
00294     /**
00295      * @brief Checks if page has a given template
00296      * 
00297      * @param string $template The template to check.
00298      * @param int $position[optional] The required position of the template.
00299      * @return bool Returns TRUE if page is that template, FALSE otherwise.
00300      */
00301     public function hasTemplate($template, $position = false) {
00302         $template = trim($template);
00303         $templates = explode('/', $this->template);
00304         
00305         if ($position === false) {
00306             // no position
00307             foreach ($templates as $key => $value) {
00308                 if ($value == $template) {
00309                     return true;
00310                 }
00311             }
00312         } else {
00313             if (isset($templates[$position]) && isset($templates[$position]) == $template) {
00314                 return true;
00315             }
00316         }
00317         
00318         return false;
00319     }
00320     
00321     public function getTemplateJs() { return $this->template . '.js'; }
00322     
00323     public function htmlTemplateJs() {
00324         $tmp = "<!-- Begin Template JS -->\n"
00325             . "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"/js/common.js\"></script>\n";
00326         if ($this->template) {
00327             $templateJs =  $this->getTemplateJs();
00328             if (file_exists(BOO_WEBROOT_DIR . "/js/{$templateJs}")) {
00329                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"/js/{$templateJs}\"></script>\n";
00330             } // else do nothing
00331         }
00332         $tmp .= "<!-- End Template JS -->\n";
00333         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00334         $html->setContent($tmp);
00335         return $html;
00336     }

00340     public function htmlTemplateCss() {
00341         $tmp = "<!-- Begin Template CSS -->\n"
00342             . "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"/css/common.css\" charset=\"utf-8\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" />\n";
00343             
00344         if ($this->template) {
00345             $templateCss =  $this->getTemplateCss();
00346             if (file_exists(BOO_WEBROOT_DIR . "/css/{$templateCss}")) {
00347                 $tmp .= "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"/css/{$templateCss}\" charset=\"utf-8\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" />\n";
00348             } // else do nothing
00349         }
00350         $tmp .= "<!-- End Template CSS -->\n";
00351         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00352         $html->setContent($tmp);
00353         return $html;
00354     }

00356     /**
00357      * @brief Creates conditional comments for IE.
00358      * 
00359      * Works with:
00360      * \li IE 6 = /css/ie6.css
00361      * \li IE 7 = /css/ie7.css
00362      * \li IE 8 = /css/ie8.css
00363      * 
00364      * @return string Returns HTML conditional comments.
00365      */
00366     public function htmlConditionalCss() {
00367             $tmp = "<!-- Begin Conditional CSS -->\n"
00368             . "<!--[if IE 6]><link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"/css/ie6.css\" charset=\"utf-8\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" /><![endif]-->\n"
00369             . "<!--[if IE 7]><link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"/css/ie7.css\" charset=\"utf-8\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" /><![endif]-->\n"
00370             . "<!--[if IE 8]><link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"/css/ie8.css\" charset=\"utf-8\" type=\"text/css\" media=\"screen\" /><![endif]-->\n"
00371             . "<!-- End Conditional CSS -->\n";
00372             
00373         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00374         $html->setContent($tmp);
00375         return $html;
00376     }
00377     
00378     public function htmlHeadAll() { 
00379         $tmp = '';
00380         $tmp .= $this->htmlBooJs();
00381         $tmp .= $this->htmlBooCss();
00382         $tmp .= $this->htmlPageJs();
00383         $tmp .= $this->htmlPageCss();
00384         $tmp .= $this->htmlTemplateJs();
00385         $tmp .= $this->htmlTemplateCss();
00386         $tmp .= $this->htmlConditionalCss();
00387         
00388         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00389         $html->setContent($tmp);
00390         return $html;
00391     }

00394     /**
00395      * @brief Adds a JavaScript file.
00396      * 
00397      * Added for API compatibility.
00398      * 
00399      * @since 2.0.0
00400      * @see Boo_Page::addPageJs()
00401      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00402      * @param string $src The source for the JavaScript file.
00403      */
00404     public function addJs($src) { return $this->addPageJs($src); }
00405     
00406     /**
00407      * @brief Adds a JavaScript file.
00408      * 
00409      * @since 2.0.0
00410      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00411      * @param mixed $src The source for the JavaScript file or Boo_Html object.
00412      */
00413     public function addPageJs($src) {
00414         
00415         if ($src instanceof Boo_Html) {
00416             $this->pageJs[] = $src;
00417         } else {
00418             $script = new Boo_Html_Script;
00419             $script->setAttr('src', $src);
00420             $this->pageJs[] = $script;
00421         }
00422         
00423         return true;
00424     }
00425     
00426     /**
00427      * @brief Returns the page specific JavaScript tags.
00428      * @return Boo_Html The page specific JavaScript tags.
00429      */
00430     public function htmlPageJs() {
00431         if (empty($this->pageJs)) {
00432             return new Boo_Html_Empty;
00433         }
00434         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00435         $html->appendContent("<!-- Begin Page JS -->\n");
00436         foreach ($this->pageJs as $key => $value) {
00437             $html->appendContent($value);
00438             $html->appendContent("\n");
00439         }
00440         $html->appendContent("<!-- End Page JS -->\n");
00441         
00442         return $html;
00443     }
00444     
00445     /**
00446      * @brief Adds a CSS file.
00447      * 
00448      * Added for API compatibility.
00449      * 
00450      * @since 2.0.0
00451      * @see Boo_Page::addPageCss()
00452      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00453      * @param string $href The href for the CSS file.
00454      * @param string $media[optional] The type of media for the CSS file.
00455      */
00456     public function addCss($href, $media = 'screen') { return $this->addPageCss($href, $media); }
00457     
00458     /**
00459      * @brief Adds a CSS file.
00460      * 
00461      * @since 2.0.0
00462      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00463      * @param mixed $href The href for the CSS file or Boo_Html object.
00464      * @param string $media[optional] The type of media for the CSS file.
00465      */
00466     public function addPageCss($href, $media = false) {
00467         if ($href instanceof Boo_Html) {
00468             if ($media !== false) {
00469                 $href->setAttr('media', $media);
00470             }
00471             $this->pageCss[] = $href;
00472             
00473         } else {
00474             $link = new Boo_Html_Link;
00475             if ($media !== false) {
00476                 $link->setAttr('media', $media);
00477             }
00478             $link->setAttr('href', $href);
00479             $this->pageCss[] = $link;
00480         }
00481         return true;
00482     }
00483     
00484     /**
00485      * @brief Returns the page specific CSS tags.
00486      * @return Boo_Html The page specific CSS tags.
00487      */
00488     public function htmlPageCss() {
00489         if (empty($this->pageCss)) {
00490             return new Boo_Html_Empty;
00491         }
00492         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00493         $html->appendContent("<!-- Begin Page CSS -->\n");
00494         foreach ($this->pageCss as $key => $value) {
00495             $html->appendContent($value);
00496             $html->appendContent("\n");
00497         }
00498         $html->appendContent("<!-- End Page CSS -->\n");
00499 
00500         return $html;
00501     }
00502     
00503     public function htmlBooJs() {
00504         $tmp = "<!-- Begin Boo JS -->\n";
00505         if(BOO_PRODUCTION) {
00506             if (GOOGLE_AJAX) {
00507                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.3/jquery.min.js\"></script>\n";
00508             } else {
00509                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/lib/jquery.min.js\"></script>\n";
00510             }
00511         } else {
00512             if (GOOGLE_AJAX) {
00513                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.3/jquery.js\"></script>\n";
00514             } else {
00515                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/lib/jquery.js\"></script>\n";
00516             }
00517         }
00518         
00519         $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/functions.js\"></script>\n"
00520             . "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/jquery.boo.js\"></script>\n"
00521             . "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/jquery.fixIE6.js\"></script>\n"
00522             . "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/jquery.messageBox.js\"></script>\n"
00523             . "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"" . BOO_JS_DIR_HTML . "/jquery.xmlForm.js\"></script>\n";
00524         
00525         if (BOO_PI_DEBUGGER) {
00526             if (BOO_PRODUCTION) {
00527                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"http://pi-js.googlecode.com/files/pi.1.1.1.min.js\"></script>\n";
00528             } else {
00529                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"http://pi-js.googlecode.com/files/pi.1.1.1.js\"></script>\n";
00530             }
00531         }
00532         
00533         if (BOO_FIREBUG_LITE) {
00534             if (BOO_PRODUCTION) {
00535                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"http://getfirebug.com/releases/lite/1.2/firebug-lite-compressed.js\"></script>\n";
00536             } else {
00537                 $tmp .= "<script type=\"text/javascript\" charset=\"utf-8\" src=\"http://getfirebug.com/releases/lite/1.2/firebug-lite.js\"></script>\n";
00538             }
00539         }
00540         
00541         $tmp .= "<!-- End Boo JS -->\n";
00542         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00543         $html->setContent($tmp);
00544         return $html;
00545     }

00551             . "<!-- End Boo CSS -->\n";
00552         $html = new Boo_Html(false);

00554         return $html;

00557     public function setTitle($title) {

00559         if ($title) {
00560             $this->title = $title;
00561             return true;
00562         } else {
00563             return false;
00564         }
00565     }

00576     /**
00577      * @brief Returns IP address.
00578      * 
00579      * @return mixed Returns the current users IP address if available, FALSE otherwise.
00580      */
00581     public static function getIp() {
00582         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARD_FOR']) && $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARD_FOR']) {
00583             $ip = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARD_FOR'];
00584         } else {
00585             $ip = isset($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) ? $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] : false;
00586         }
00587         
00588         return $ip;
00589     }
00590     
00591     
00592     public function requireGroup($group) {
00593         if ($this->user->isInGroup("group")) {
00594             return true;
00595         } else {
00596             $this->msgSuccess->addMessage("You are not authorized to view this page.");
00597             $this->msgSuccess->saveSession();
00598             
00599             $url = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
00600             if ($url == '/') { $url = ''; } // remove slash 
00601 
00602             $this->redirect('/login/?url=' . urlencode($url));
00603             
00604             return false;
00605         }
00606     }
00607     
00608     /**
00609      * @breif Sets the headers for no cache.
00610      * 
00611      * This is usefull when making AJAX requests.
00612      * 
00613      * @param string $contentLength The content length, defaults to not set. 
00614      * @param string $contentType The content type, defaults to text/html.
00615      * @param string $charset The charset, defaults to utf-8.
00616      * @return bool Returns TURE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00617      * 
00618      */
00619     public static function headerNoCache($contentLength = -1, $contentType = 'text/html', $charset = 'utf-8') {
00620         // check if content length is a positive integer or 0  
00621         if (ctype_digit((string) $contentLength)) {
00622             header('Content-Length: ' . $contentLength);
00623         } elseif ($contentLength == -1) {
00624             // default value used, do nothing
00625         } else {
00626             trigger_error("Content lenght {$contentLength} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00627             return false;
00628         }
00629         
00630         Boo_Page::headerContentType($contentType, $charset);
00631         
00632         header('Expires: Mon, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00');
00633         header('Last-Modified: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s') . ' GMT');
00634         header('Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate'); // HTTP/1.1
00635         header('Pragma: no-cache'); // HTTP/1.0
00636         return true;
00637     }
00638     
00639     /**
00640      * @breif Sets the Content-Type header.
00641      *
00642      * This function is provided as a convenience.
00643      * 
00644      * @param string $contentType The content type, defaults to text/html.
00645      * @param string $charset The charset, defaults to utf-8.  
00646      * @return bool TURE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00647      * 
00648      */
00649     public static function headerContentType($contentType = 'text/html', $charset = 'utf-8') {
00650         header("Content-Type: {$contentType}; charset={$charset}");
00651         return true;
00652     }
00653     
00654     /**
00655      * @brief Logout user.
00656      * 
00657      * @param mixed $redirect[optional] Redirect user to default URL if TRUE or to the value of \a $redirect if not FALSE.
00658      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00659      */
00660     public function logout($redirect = true) {
00661         if ($this->user->logout()) {
00662             $username = $this->user->getUsername();
00663             $this->msgSuccess->addMessage("Logout of user {$username} completed successfully.");
00664             $this->msgSuccess->saveSession();
00665             
00666             if ($redirect === true) {
00667                 $url = '/login/';
00668             } else {
00669                 $url = urldecode($redirect);
00670             }
00671             $this->redirect($url);
00672             return true;
00673         } else {
00674             if ($redirect !== true && $redirect) {
00675                 $this->redirect(urldecode($redirect));
00676             }
00677             return false;
00678         }
00679     }
00680     
00681     /**
00682      * @brief Login the user.
00683      * 
00684      * @param string $username[optional] The username. If it is not set then Boo_User::getUsername() will be used.
00685      * @param string $password[optional] The password. If it is not set then Boo_User::getPassword() will be used.
00686      * @param mixed $redirect[optional] Redirect user to default URL if TRUE or to the value of \a $redirect if not FALSE.
00687      * 
00688      * @return Returns TRUE if login was successful, FALSE otherwise.
00689      */
00690     public function login($username = false, $password = false, $redirect = true) {
00691         if ($this->user->login($username, $password)) {
00692             if ($this->user->isStatusOK()) {
00693                 $this->msgSuccess->addMessage("Login of user {$username} completed successfully.");
00694                 $this->msgSuccess->saveSession();
00695                 
00696                 if ($redirect) {
00697                     $url = "/user/{$username}/"; // default
00698                     
00699                     if (isset($_GET['url'])) {
00700                         // redirect to the requested url
00701                         $url = urldecode($_GET['url']);
00702                     } elseif ($redirect !== true) {
00703                         $url = urldecode($redirect);
00704                     }
00705                     $this->redirect($url);
00706                 }
00707             
00708                 return true;
00709             } else {
00710                 switch ($this->user->getStatus()) {
00711                     case BOO_STATUS_CLOSED:
00712                         $this->msgError->addMessage('Your account is closed. You can not login.');
00713                         $this->msgError->saveSession();
00714                         break;
00715                     case BOO_STATUS_SUSPENDED:
00716                         $this->msgError->addMessage('Your account is suspended. If you believe this was in error please contact an administrator.');
00717                         $this->msgError->saveSession();
00718                         break;
00719                     case BOO_STATUS_DISABLED:
00720                         $this->msgError->addMessage('Your account is has been disabled by an administrator.');
00721                         $this->msgError->saveSession();
00722                         break;
00723                     case BOO_STATUS_PENDING:
00724                         $this->msgError->addMessage('Your account is currently pending review. You can not login until your account has be approved.');
00725                         $this->msgError->saveSession();
00726                         break;  
00727                     case BOO_STATUS_UNKNOWN: default:
00728                         $this->msgError->addMessage('Account status is unknown. Please contact an administrator.');
00729                         $this->msgError->saveSession();
00730                 }
00731                 
00732                 $this->user->logout();
00733                 return false;
00734             }
00735         } else {
00736             // login failed
00737             $this->msgError->addMessage('Login failed, please try again.');
00738             $this->msgError->saveSession();
00739             
00740             
00741             if ($redirect !== true && $redirect) {
00742                 $this->redirect(urldecode($redirect));
00743             }
00744             
00745             return false;
00746         }
00747     }
00748     /**
00749      * @brief Require authorization.
00750      * 
00751      * @param mixed $redirect[optional] Redirect user to default URL if TRUE or to the value of \a $redirect if not FALSE.
00752      * @return bool Returns TRUE if authorized, FALSE otherwise. If \a $redirect is FALSE and authorization fails program will exit.
00753      */
00754     public function requireAuth($redirect = true) {
00755         // make sure the user is logged in
00756         if ($this->isAuth()) {
00757             if ($redirect !== true && $redirect) {
00758                 $url = urldecode($redirect);
00759                 $this->redirect($url);
00760             }
00761             return true;
00762         } else {
00763             $this->msgSuccess->addMessage('You are not authorized to view this page.');
00764             $this->msgSuccess->saveSession();
00765             
00766             if ($redirect) {
00767                 if ($redirect === true) {
00768                     // default
00769                     $url = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
00770                     if ($url == '/') { $url = ''; } // remove slash
00771                     
00772                     $url = '/login/?url=' . urlencode($url);
00773                 } else {
00774                     $url = urldecode($redirect);
00775                 }
00776                 
00777                 //echo $url; // useful for debbugin
00778                 $this->redirect($url);
00779                 return false;
00780             } else {
00781                 trigger_error('Authorization failed', E_USER_WARNING);
00782                 exit('Authorization failed');
00783                 return false;
00784             }
00785         }
00786     }
00787     
00788     
00789     /**
00790      * @breif Determines if the user is authorized.
00791      * 
00792      * Provides a convenient API hook into the user object.
00793      * 
00794      * @return bool TURE if authorized, FALSE otherwise.
00795      * 
00796      */
00797     public function isAuth() { return $this->user->isAuth(); }
00798     
00799 
00800     public function allowGroup($groupId) {
00801         $groupId = (int) $groupId;
00802         if ($this->user->getGroupId() == $groupId) {
00803             // user is a member of the  group
00804             return true;
00805         } else {
00806             if ($this->user->isRoot()) {
00807                 // root is always allowed
00808                 return true;
00809             } else {
00810                 $this->msgError->addMessage('You are not allowed to access this page.');
00811                 $this->msgError->saveSession();
00812                 $this->redirect();
00813                 return false;
00814             }
00815         }
00816     }
00817     
00818     public function allowGroupEmpty() { return $this->allowGroup(BOO_GROUP_EMPTY); }
00819     
00820     public function allowGroupRoot() { return $this->allowGroup(BOO_GROUP_ROOT); }
00821     
00822     public function allowGroupAdmin() { return $this->allowGroup(BOO_GROUP_ADMIN); }
00823     
00824     public function allowGroupUser() { return $this->allowGroup(BOO_GROUP_USER); }
00825     
00826     public function allowGroupAnonymous() { return $this->allowGroup(BOO_GROUP_ANONYMOUS); }
00827 
00828     public function excludeGroup($groupId) {
00829         $groupId = (int) $groupId;
00830         if ($this->user->getGroupId() == $groupId) {
00831             if ($this->user->isRoot()) {
00832                 // root is always allowed
00833                 return true;
00834             } else {
00835                 $this->msgError->addMessage('You are not allowed to access this page.');
00836                 $this->msgError->saveSession();
00837                 $this->redirect();
00838                 return false;
00839             }
00840         } else {
00841             // user not a member of the group
00842             return true;
00843         }
00844     }
00845     
00846     public function excludeGroupEmpty() { return $this->excludeGroup(BOO_GROUP_EMPTY); }
00847     
00848     public function excludeGroupAdmin() { return $this->excludeGroup(BOO_GROUP_ADMIN); }
00849     
00850     public function excludeGroupUser() { return $this->excludeGroup(BOO_GROUP_USER); }
00851     
00852     public function excludeGroupAnonymous() { return $this->excludeGroup(BOO_GROUP_ANONYMOUS); }
00853     
00854     /**
00855      * @brief Returns meta generator tag for Boo.
00856      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
00857      * @return Boo_Html_Meta The meta generator tag for Boo.
00858      */
00859     public function htmlGeneratorMeta(array $attrs = array()) {
00860         $meta = new Boo_Html_Meta;
00861         $meta->applyAttrs($attrs);
00862         $meta->setAttr('name', 'generator');
00863         $meta->setAttr('content', 'Boo ' . BOO_VERSION);
00864         
00865         return $meta;
00866     }
